impression: [item] No acute intracranial pathology. [item] No acute/traumatic cervical spine pathology. [item] Stranding of the upper mediastinal and periaortic fat with a small amount of high attenuating fluid abutting posterior aspect of the aortic arch concerning for mediastinal contusion/hematoma. A traumatic aortic injury is not excluded. Correlation with clinical exam recommended. CT of the chest with IV contrast is recommended for further evaluation of the thoracic aorta.
